title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 351.9 - Ability to understand speech; hearing aids
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 351.9 - Ability to understand speech; hearing aids

State Regulations

No consideration should be given to the question of whether
or not the ability of a claimant to understand speech is improved by use of a
hearing aid. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
351.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
